item.title: U.S. stocks are expensive, but Goldman Sachs says investors should keep buying them
item.description: The 2025 outlook from Goldman Sachs' Investment Strategy Group calls for an overweight position on U.S. stocks.

item.title: Morgan Stanley says this beauty stock is now a great value after being cut in half
item.description: The Wall Street investment bank upgraded shares to overweight from equal weight.

item.title: Evercore ISI upgrades Chewy, says spending on pets is set to increase from here
item.description: Gains could be in store for this pet retailer amid a normalizing U.S. pet industry, according to Evercore ISI.

item.title: UBS upgrades Capital One ahead of Discover Financial acquisition
item.description: Capital One Financial's acquisition of Discover Financial Services could spell upside for both stocks in the coming months, according to UBS.

item.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades this home furnishings stock, calls for nearly 30% upside ahead
item.description: Shares of this luxury lifestyle brand may be poised for big gains ahead, according to Morgan Stanley.
